Chemicals from tires are also a problem for salmon. Tires contain 6PPD to make them last longer. As they degrade, particles dust fall on roadways , when 6PPD reacts with ozone, it creates 6PPD-quinone, a chemical that’s lethal to salmon small organisms gets into waterways via stormwater.
